The authors thank the anonymous referees for their valuable suggestions that improved the exposition of this paper.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Department of Mathematics, Shanghai University, Shanghai 200444, P. R. China
Department of Gastroenterology, Tong Ren Hospital, Jiaotong University School of Medicine, Shanghai, P. R. China

head.citation-title: A simultaneous decomposition for three quaternion tensors with applications in color video signal processing
head.abstracts: © 2021 World Scientific Publishing Company.In this paper, we establish a simultaneous decomposition for three quaternion tensors via Einstein product. This simultaneous decomposition transforms the given three quaternion tensors into nice forms which have only 1 and 0. We conclude with an application in the color video signal processing. This new approach only needs to store four keys to realize the simultaneous encryption and decryption of three videos.

affiliation.ce:source-text: Department of Mathematics, Shanghai University, Shanghai 200444, P. R. China

grant-text.$: This research was supported by the grants from the National Natural Science Foundation of China (Grant No. 11801354), Shanghai Changning District Health and Family Planning Commission (Grant No. 2016Y006). The authors thank the anonymous referees for their valuable suggestions that improved the exposition of this paper.

coredata.dc:description: In this paper, we establish a simultaneous decomposition for three quaternion tensors via Einstein product. This simultaneous decomposition transforms the given three quaternion tensors into nice forms which have only 1 and 0. We conclude with an application in the color video signal processing. This new approach only needs to store four keys to realize the simultaneous encryption and decryption of three videos.
coredata.dc:title: A simultaneous decomposition for three quaternion tensors with applications in color video signal processing
